website_summaries.verdict: This strong conclusion to BioWare's acclaimed sci-fi RPG trilogy will be best appreciated by fans who have followed it from the beginning, but newcomers don't need to worry about being lost or left behind along the way.
pros: Multiple play modes cater to every gaming style
cons: Galaxy at War system conveys additional benefits only to mobile-, multiplayer-oriented users

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but forget the ending
customer_reviews.text: In a nutshell, this game combines the best of both of its predecessors, bringing ME2's fighting mechanics and ME1's plot elements. This results in a truly amazing and graphically incredible game that's really hard to put down. This game's enemies are creatively thought-out, tenacious, and powerful, making the game both more challenging and exciting than its predecessors. I honestly hated the ending like most gamers did, but I can't get over how good the rest of the game is. The DLCs are exciting in their own right and add many hours of gameplay to an already amazing game.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: I Enjoyed This But I am Scared Now
customer_reviews.text: Epic story. I loved it. I almost cried. But didn't because I was too tough and hollow back then. Synthesis is the key...but remember, isn't that what John Connor was fighting for in Terminator: Genisys??? It happened in the Matrix...I'm just sayin...
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to check region before purchase.
customer_reviews.text: A great game from an epic saga, still one of my favorite series, been enjoying it since launch. Only minor issue I had that is a non-issue is I recieved a French language copy. Disc was brand new, still in shrink wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Asana Synsdóttir-GoodFellow

customer_reviews.title: The characters are fantastic, and the story is memorable
customer_reviews.text: The characters are fantastic, and the story is memorable. The DLC, especially Citadel lets you spend more time with the characters you love. The graphics are fantastic, even in multiplayer. Speaking of multiplayer, it is addicting and fun. Over 40 different characters with different powers - you can build them all to play uniquely.
customer_reviews.author: Manny1222

customer_reviews.title: Mass Effect Series is a legendary gaming experience!
customer_reviews.text: The Mass Effect Series is a must-have and must-play series for any RPG, FPS gamer! It has a very rich storyline and allows the player to alter the course of the game by making decisions every step of the way. This is a squad-based game that allows for a fun tactical experience working with different characters and their respective skillsets. All in all, this game is superb and deserves all the praise it receives!
customer_reviews.author: ZstarZ

customer_reviews.title: fun, for a while
customer_reviews.text: The story behind this game is great! I hadn't played either of the previous mass effect games and was able to follow basically everything in this game. background knowledge as to the previous stories would help but I don't feel it's necessary. Graphically, this is superb and breathtaking. my main issue, was that it was too long. I played for hours and hours and just got bored with it. i'd rent for the weekend, but not buy, unless I was a huge fan of the series
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent game
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game series. I have played ME 1 and 2 and do think this game is better if you play the other 2 before hand,. The continuity of the story is better than in any other game series. The characters are compelling, the story and plot is great and the gameplay is perfect for an RPG. Super customizable, you can play this game all the way through at least 3 times and have a different experience each time. The multiplayer is also good, if a bit repetitive after a while. Overall, 9.7 out of 10!
customer_reviews.author: Olivier Morency

customer_reviews.title: Great game if you played the first two.
customer_reviews.text: The ending was a bit disappointing but all of the dlc makes this a better game and the Extended Cut dlc makes the ending better but not great. Overall, this third game of the Mass Effect trilogy has improved graphics and the shooting mechanics are much better. The cut scenes are good and the crew talks to one another which makes the game more like a movie and more interesting. You get to land on Mars and go to Earth twice, first in Vancouver and at the end in London.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Webb

customer_reviews.title: BRILLIANT
customer_reviews.text: The MassEffect Trilogy was Awesome! Sure the ending doesn't culminate everything from part 1 and 2, which is what Bioware originally promised. We were supposed to have save data that transfered to each sequal and effect the climactic finale and it just didn't happen. I am upset but, so what! All three games were great. Mass Effect 3 had some of the best missions, characters, drama, intrigue, etc. of any game ever made. It's a classic!
customer_reviews.author: Buddy2Mello

customer_reviews.title: A good if disappointing finish to a great series.
customer_reviews.text: Say all you will about the ending, but an ending does not a game make. Of all media, perhaps video games are the ones where the story payoff is least important (although not unimportant). What really matters is how it engages you and how much fun you have on the journey. Although the ending isn't the greatest (I personally don't have the vitriol many do) the journey getting there is quite the ride.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Adams

customer_reviews.title: Mass effect series is one of the greatest game series of all time
customer_reviews.text: Mass effect series is one of the greatest game series of all time. The ups and downs of the action, the relationships the story, and the perfect ending will leave you satisfied and nostalgic, ready for the next run through.. Will forever be my ultimate favorite game series ever created.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Space Epic
customer_reviews.text: Great way to end a story, I prefer how it ended then how fans demanded. Hero dies for peace in the Galaxy, who can't like that ending (apparently ever person other than me). Great graphics with in depth game play. Also first Mass Effect to have multi-player which is really fun. Fun game, really good space story game.
customer_reviews.author: lisa mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this game. There is literally nothing bad I can think to say about it. My husband and I have each played through this game 3 times each. The RPG makes it a different game every time. It plays smooth and the graphics/sound are flawless. I do and have always highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jcampbell

customer_reviews.title: Another solid entry from Bioware
customer_reviews.text: Overall, Mass Effect is an enjoyable game filled with hours and hours of action-packed and story-driven content. While I understand the many issuess regarding the ending, all trilogies must have an ending and I support Bioware's decisions. While it's not quite at the second game's level, Mass Effect is a remarkable entry not only to the series, but also to video games in general.
customer_reviews.author: Sean A Petersen

customer_reviews.title: great ending to a great series
customer_reviews.text: great ending to a great series! mass effect is a series everyone with a console/gaming PC needs to try. It will be a classic
customer_reviews.author: Emily Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not as bad as people say
customer_reviews.text: Ok: The ending was slightly disappointing, but it wasn't enough to make me despise this game. This game was an emotional wild ride and had a lot of great story moments. The Gameplay was pretty good, which should take precedent over the ending. Yes, the ending is important, but this game was the best ending to the Mass Effect Trilogy and I enjoyed it all the way through.
customer_reviews.author: HarmonicaJay

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.  Multiplayer surprisingly enjoyable.
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the first two games but still worthy of the title. The multiplayer was surprisingly good and not just an afterthought like most single-player games with the obligatory BS multi-player thrown in. I would like to see them do more with the multiplayer idea like maybe release a more fleshed out DLC or something.
customer_reviews.author: ltimbo

customer_reviews.title: Product was in French
customer_reviews.text: Product was in FRENCH. I was unable to change it in the menus too. There was no mention of this in the product description, so thanks pal.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Story Rich
customer_reviews.text: Good game, great series, very disappointing ending. Makes the player very much aware of the end of the world on his/her shoulders and the idea that you are the solution, effective narrative and gripping.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great game play great story great game
customer_reviews.text: I know a lot of people had a problem with the ending of this game but it is still worth playing it is still an amazing game is a great story
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sluggo

customer_reviews.title: I am the chosen one! to review this...
customer_reviews.text: If you have time I recommend purchasing mass effect 1, 2 and 3 because it was a great story that provides a different perception on life. It is also a great game, although in the 2nd one you have to farm a lot for upgrades. But overall one of the best series i played and choice your decisions wisely...
customer_reviews.author: Desmon devery

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate failure.
customer_reviews.text: Game done excellently in so many ways; only to have an amateurish, poorly structured ending slapped on. The best analogy is to run within the top three for every lap of the race... but on the last lap, to cause a wreck and ram the pace car, disqualifying yourself and getting yourself arrested. Definitely rushed into completion, and unapologetic stance in the aftermath didn't help at all.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: One of the best game series ever.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Mass Effect series so happy to own this one with the other two the ending wasn't to great but it doesn't really matter. It plays great the stories fantastic and so happy I own it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Its a hit
customer_reviews.text: Good pacing, fun story. I chose to have it auto select my responses, so it can play in different ways depending on your initial setup. Great guns and lots of upgrades /mods. Taking down my first Reaper was an accomplishment, but rather simple with the weapon they give you. Lots of quests to keep you busy.
customer_reviews.author: Joey C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my all time favorite games. The mass effect series is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite series ever. A wonderful and thought provoking trilogy. I cared about all of the characters.
customer_reviews.author: rye

customer_reviews.title: This game gets a lot of hate for its ending
customer_reviews.text: This game gets a lot of hate for its ending, however I think it's an excellent ending to an excellent series. It wraps the series up nicely. Also, the Citadel DLC is definitely worth buying with the game. It adds some beautiful scenes featuring all of the characters and gives the player a better sense of closure. My one complaint is that in order to achieve the "Perfect" ending to the game, you must play hours of multiplayer content which is very annoying. Otherwise, it would be a five star game.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: This was a fun game to play
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun game to play. The graphics have come a long way since ME1. Despite a lot of people being disappointed with the ending, after the third play-through, I realized how beautifully subtle the lead-up to it was across all 3 games.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: great series
customer_reviews.text: Good ending to the series, not as many plot twists as the original, good to see all the old cast back for another round.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Better than the whiners say
customer_reviews.text: a lot of people didnt like the ending, i think its because they have no imaginations. It doesnt wrap everything up in a nice neat manner but that makes it cool. Dont let the naysayers talk you out of playing it. Its great!
customer_reviews.author: Handsome Harry

customer_reviews.title: The end of the most incredible game ever played!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's sad but it's true! The sequence ends with this title as the war!!!! Shepard has to fight against the worst enemy and he's obliged to join all forces in the galaxy to help him!!!! But of course, choices are waivers!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Braga

customer_reviews.title: Ending a Trilogy
customer_reviews.text: No Spoilers. I bought ME3 at the very end of 2013, so this review is a little bit late. I will be brief. ME3 is different to ME2 and ME1, but it combines the best of both, and adds its own unique flavor to the series. Most people's main gripe was the ending. I would disagree and say that the ending was an excellent cap to the trilogy. In fact, I don't know how it could have been done any better. Perhaps this is personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: brilliant game
customer_reviews.text: This game is one of my favorites and a great way to end the Mass Effect Trilogy. Amazing story, amazing ending and amazing gameplay. This game I recommend for anyone that loves RPG style games and doesn't mind third person shooters. There is a ton of customization and many different outcomes. Such a fantastic game.
customer_reviews.author: Chanse

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: Great game. The ending is kind of blah, but the game itself is awesome. Definitely, recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Western28

customer_reviews.title: You can have sex in this game.
customer_reviews.text: Sex. With aliens. Or people. Your choice. Go forth and enjoy the space sex.
customer_reviews.author: Samarak

customer_reviews.title: ME3 is the best
customer_reviews.text: This is now my favorite game. The story was a fantastic ending to the epic tale I started years ago in the first Mass Effect. The characters are engaging. I actually cried at the end of Morodin's story. The multiplayer is a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Love this Game
customer_reviews.text: Love this game One of my favorites, Love how they stuck to all the old themes, and previous crew members...
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Received Spanish version
customer_reviews.text: Received the game in Spanish. Nothing in the description suggested anything other than the English version.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Decent End to Story, fun Combat
customer_reviews.text: PROS: 1. It ends the story one way or another and you reunite with all the characters from past games who are still alive to your character. 2. Good combat and controls CONS: 1. Endings, not for everyone 2. DLC for things like completing the Omega storyline or getting your whole crew together.
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: Great game with lots of potential for bigger and better episodes with the more you play the game.
customer_reviews.text: The story continues and I have been playing this since the game came out. I cannot consider not playing this one.
customer_reviews.author: Issac J. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you like Si Fi you like this and it was one of the games of the year.
customer_reviews.author: John B. Finn

customer_reviews.title: One of the greatest game series I've had the pleasure of playing.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite gaming franchises. An epic story line is balanced well with unique and interesting characters. I would recommend playing all three games for the best effect. You will come to love the characters and grow with them, and it's cool being able to make your own decisions, which shape some of the events before you, and also personalize your character entirely. It's an amazing game, BUY IT NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Just a Dude

customer_reviews.title: This was the last game I played on my 360 before I had to sell it and I'm very happy it was this
customer_reviews.text: Don't care about the controversy that surrounded the ending. I finally got to finish the series! This was the last game I played on my 360 before I had to sell it and I'm very happy it was this.
customer_reviews.author: John Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Best computer game ever
customer_reviews.text: What a game! Perhaps the best computer game series ever created. The ending was great - I didn't have any problem with it, though I know many other people did. Played all 3 Mass effect games straight through this summer - wow, what a ride!
customer_reviews.author: Honestlytruereview

customer_reviews.title: macosta1167
customer_reviews.text: I guess I can give this game a good review because I can't stop my kids from playing with this game and it's I have a hard time getting them out of their rooms lol, I had no problems with packaging nor delivery, I recommend
customer_reviews.author: msully

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: I didnt know that this game had two disc. However, my husband it enjoying the fact that there is more of a storyline than that of Skyrim...it is open world, with several (I mean ALOT) of missions and it keeps him busy yet relaxed after a long day of work.
customer_reviews.author: ashley white

customer_reviews.title: Great game. Addicting.
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorites! Mass effect is an awesome trilogy. Good graphics, addicting gameplay and good plot. This game offers the same gameplay as 2 and isn't really anything new. Still superfun.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It never started it downloaded the game tried to start but black screen appears and never stated
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: great game.
customer_reviews.text: Great game had too skip the 2nd one do to receiving a UK Mass Effect 2 which won't run on US consoles. Ending is still pretty awful but overall it is a great game.
customer_reviews.author: Goldenowner07

customer_reviews.title: Love this series
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best video game series. My husband absolutely loves it, and I even enjoy it. The graphics and storyline are great.
customer_reviews.author: avidreader89

customer_reviews.title: Bioware Finishes The Fight
customer_reviews.text: Bought this copy almost entirely for the online co-op multiplayer so I could play with my friends. That's worth the money alone, I think. As far as single-player goes, this is still absolutely Mass Effect. The characters and story are engaging, the gameplay is fun and smoother than ever, and it brings an end to an epic storyline. Yes the originally published ending was a kick to the groin, but if you download the Extended Cut (free), it will feel like a much softer kick in the groin. Still worth it for the co-op multiplayer. Comes with a working online activation code.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Solid Game
customer_reviews.text: Solid Game, one of the best out there, a solid improvement in most aspects over the previous title and I'm really excited for the next one.
customer_reviews.author: Joshy G

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of Game Content
customer_reviews.text: A TON of missions and side missions and objectives. Did not have time to ever completely finish it but that means their was plenty of content.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rico

customer_reviews.title: Great for the basic version.
customer_reviews.text: Came with the free download for the enhanced ending. I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of the Mass Effect game series. The game itself is a good game. Written well, great graphics, but the ending is what ruined it for me. Not sure why bioware decided to end the series this way. False advertising about the game play through effecting the ending. There are basically three endings and they are pretty much the same. I cannot give it five stars due to this. I personally will not be buying any of the future mass effect games if there are any
customer_reviews.author: M. Trentham

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: great game however not as good as the other too but I would still recommend it if you want to finish the series otherwise just play one and two
customer_reviews.author: Paul Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: This game was recommended to my by a friend
customer_reviews.text: This game was recommended to my by a friend. Most people don't think that women should be on the front lines of battle. In this game, you can choose to break that rule and have you character be a woman or a man. If you are familiar with The Walking Dead from Telltale Games and The Wolf Among Us, you will see that your choices will affect the outcome of the game.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Nason

customer_reviews.title: Having fun!
customer_reviews.text: So far it has worked well and has been good.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Cohee

customer_reviews.title: Mass Effect 3
customer_reviews.text: This game ends the story of Shephard. I love the story line, it was a little disappointing at the end but all in all, a great game. I will play this game over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Buchmeier

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Nice game, I got this as a christmas present for my husband and he likes it a lot. He was already a Mass Effect fan so he was very pleased to receive this one.

customer_reviews.title: meticulous and pristine and just an awesome game I've played like 6 times already
customer_reviews.text: Item came well, I got it on Amazon Warehouse Deals. meticulous and pristine and just an awesome game I've played like 6 times already.
customer_reviews.author: Jeaniffer Alarcon

customer_reviews.title: Good game all in all
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game, but the ending is a lame. The game play is excellent and the game characters are still strong.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Coffman

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift so I don't really know how ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift so I don't really know how well it is. 3 stars for average rating given how upset folks were about the ending.

customer_reviews.title: game
customer_reviews.text: what can i tell you about the games but nothing but son plays i don't but he enjoys them very much..but the delivery was very quick and in good condition

customer_reviews.title: science fiction epic
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games and stories to be played and told. Mass effect is a game series not to be missed on any platform.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game!!! If you even remotely call yourself a fan of games then you have to play it. Highly recommend the citadel and Leviathan DLC too
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Squires

customer_reviews.title: Good game despite the criticism
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people complained about the ending and felt it wasn't on par with ME2; however, it is still a good game.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Sigh
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed 99% of this game, and the ending was just a mess. Even after they cleaned it up with DLC it was still a mess. Just ignore the ending.
customer_reviews.author: RC Matrix

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived promptly, just as advertised. I will shop again.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Baird

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game!
customer_reviews.text: Well written game, great storyline that ties the series together nicely. My only complaint was that the series ended too soon!
customer_reviews.author: Evertiro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great game play and story. It's not about the ending it's how you get there.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Buy this game!
customer_reviews.text: I think its the single greatest video game trilogy of all time... even with the updated ending that fixed the sucky end point.
customer_reviews.author: D. GriffinTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: So good.
customer_reviews.text: This game is epic. What a perfect ending to a perfect series. One of the most fantastic story lines in any medium that I've ever experienced.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Modelle

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed it but did not give a darn about the ending.
customer_reviews.text: Fun. Good gameplay. Lame ending. Fun side missions but I wish there were more side missions besides the DLC. The holiday one was fun btw And about the ending.. It's kinda lame and took out all of my vested interest.. I mean I replayed Mass Effect 2 just to be able to save my whole crew! Spoilers And then to watch em die randomly like Kelly Chambers was lame. Although Mordin was awesome and sad SO worth the play through but go ahead and turn off your computer once your shep starts crawling real slow in citadel.. because only disappointment waits from there. Just imagine the ending you want and be happy
customer_reviews.author: jerkface

customer_reviews.title: good game
customer_reviews.text: Game was GREAT. had alot of fun playing it. played 1-2 and 3 and now am waiting for 4th one to come out.
customer_reviews.author: Naveed Gill

customer_reviews.title: (Xbox 360) One of the best games I've played.
customer_reviews.text: This game lives up to all the hype. I loved Mass Effect 2 and thought that it would be difficult to improve, but the story, gameplay, and customization were excellent. I would definitely recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Well polished game with a superb story, I would highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite game series and a good ending to a great game recommened getting the other two games

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter like it
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter wanted this for Christmas. She likes this video game. She saiys she enjoys playing it on her Xbox 360.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This game was great, wish there were more of it..

customer_reviews.title: Great game!!
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son was this game he said it was very well done!! The graphics are very realistic. Very happy!

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Game that brought a great Trilogy to an end. Highly recommend it to anyone who has played the first 2

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game. Absolutely the best in the series so far!

customer_reviews.title: Xbox
customer_reviews.text: Another gift, was delivered very fast, he loves this and couldn't wait to play it.Worth the money I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Baxter

customer_reviews.title: you can't play alone effectively
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of the cooperative fighting, I like the more stand alone RPG's so if you're into that kind of thing great for you, as it allows you lots of opportunities to work with others to accomplish all of the achievements, if you like to play alone your pretty much out of luck as you will find the fighting off aliens too difficult most of the time to be fun. Love the first two ME games but this one just wasn't my cup of tea. Still cool effects, great story and huge universe but just wanted to play alone like the previous versions.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heh
customer_reviews.text: Sob... the ending was a little hard to understand space majic and all but still its a great game with Shepard going out guns ablaze.
customer_reviews.author: corey skidmore

customer_reviews.title: Sad end to a revolutionary game
customer_reviews.text: My favorite game in this series is now Mass Effect 2. In that game, your team mattered. Your weapons mattered. More importantly, your choices and decisions mattered. That all comes to a sad end in this ending to a revolutionary game. I will always have a soft spot in my heart for this series but am saddened and disappointed by how Bioware chose to end this series.
customer_reviews.author: whimsical_gamer

customer_reviews.title: Mass Effect 3
customer_reviews.text: Great sequel to Mass Effect 2. Good game play and story line.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Palubicki

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: love this game!!! game conditions as described! came in almost brand new! had no problems! hooked on the game though X_X
customer_reviews.author: Anblony

customer_reviews.title: Best game ever!
customer_reviews.text: The Mass Effect series is, in my opinion, the best of all time in the way of games. I REALLY enjoyed every single one of these games and played them all over and over. This third part of the series had the best aesthetics, and graphics I wish more people played the multiplayer on this one, because it really was underrated for how fun it was. But you can't really play it anymore because of the lack of other players. This game probably marks the end of EA doing anything this good, so I treasure it for that reason, as well because I used to love EA games.
customer_reviews.author: TrynW

customer_reviews.title: Very Awesome
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Video game franchises ever. Can't wait to continue playing.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The second one was better but hey. It was fun.
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: ehhhhhh
customer_reviews.text: pros: mutli player was good packaging was great cons: -not really alot to say about this game compared to the first two where you can make choices save people or let them die and how the choices you make effect the future game and inside the game itself this does not -big disappointment to trilogy -graphics in the second one was way better than this -it had its bumps throughout the game but was still gonna give it a 4 star till the ending -was a big mass effect fan until i played this hopefully the next one won't be as bad
customer_reviews.author: nabil

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best in this Genre!
customer_reviews.text: The most engaging of the series. Excellent graphics and great story! Too bad the story ends here. Prequel in the works?
customer_reviews.author: Proconsul8

customer_reviews.title: the game play is awesome. The story is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This game is incredible, the game play is awesome. The story is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Epic.
customer_reviews.text: Even with everybody going crazy over the ending, it's a fitting end. Overall great game and fun to play. Any Mass Effect fan should own it. Multiplayer is a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Waffle

customer_reviews.title: Not my style
customer_reviews.text: This is not a "bad" product. I simply did not enjoy the game. What I did play with friends was fun but overall I didn't have the time to get invested in the single player that it deserves. I don't like how EA manages their accounts and payments. The way they do used games and dlc frankly sucks. Sign of the times I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: If you followed the first two games this will satisfy your appetite and end the trilogy of the Mass Effect games but the people who didn't like the ending need to play the first two games to really get why it ended the way it did and I want spoil it for someone who has not played it but the games builds up steam until the finale. I would recommend this game as the best Mass Effect game of the Trilogy!
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: which feels like Casey Hudson decided to betray his own company that ...
customer_reviews.text: Besides the ending, which feels like Casey Hudson decided to betray his own company that he is a leader to, the game is pretty awesome. It has great set pieces, plenty of feels and the Reapers are awesome as always. Too bad the ending isn't changed by now but besides that it's pretty amazing. A good ending would of made it perfect though. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not as bad as people say...
customer_reviews.text: With all said and done, this one was pretty damn good.
customer_reviews.author: That One guy with a hat

product_meta.title: Mass Effect 3
product_meta.description:
Platform:Xbox 360| Edition:StandardEarth is burning. Striking from beyond known space, a race of terrifying machines have begun their destruction of the human race. As Commander Shepard, an Alliance Marine, your only hope for saving mankind is to rally the civilizations of the galaxy and launch one final mission to take back the Earth.This item does not come with a gun or controller accessory.

AMAZON.COM



 Mass Effect 3 is a Role-playing Game (RPG) / Third-Person Shooter hybrid set in a Science Fiction universe. Mass Effect 3 is the third game in the popular Mass Effect series, and is rumored to be the final installment. In it players continue the adventures of Commander Shepard utilizing extreme character customization which is the hallmark feature of the series. Additional features include: the ability to import decisions from both of the previous games into the new game, ownership/play of previous games not required, customizable weapons, improved mobility and melee combat, many returning characters (if they were not killed off in previous imported games), an improved cover system that allows for more action, compatibility with the Kinect Sensor for Xbox 360 and more. 





Join Commander Shepard in the struggle against the Reapers in the conclusion to the Mass Effect trilogy.
View larger. 

THE FINAL CHAPTER IN THE MASS EFFECT TRILOGY
 Not everyone will survive. An ancient alien race, known only as "Reapers," has launched an all-out invasion leaving nothing but a trail of destruction in their wake. Earth has been taken, the galaxy is on the verge of total annihilation, and you are the only one who can stop them. The price of failure is extinction. You are Commander Shepard, a character that you can forge in your own image. You determine how events will play out, which planets to explore, and whom to form alliances with as you rally a force to eliminate the Reaper threat once and for all. How you wage this war is completely up to you: go into combat with guns blazing or use cover to plan a more tactical assault. Utilize your squad to full effect or take a lone wolf approach. Rain death from a distance or go toe-to-toe with enemies using devastating melee attacks. Mass Effect 3 will react to each decision you make as you play through a truly unique experience of your own creation. 

KEY GAME FEATURES
 * A Rich, Branching Storyline - Experience a sci-fi epic with multiple endings determined by your choices and actions throughout the game
 * Massive in Scope - Battle on many worlds across the galaxy as you unite the ultimate force to take back the Earth before it's too late
 * Large-scale and Intelligent Enemies - Battle enormous enemies and take on a smarter type of foe that will consistently challenge your best combat tactics and put you on the edge of your seat
 * Unlock a Customizable Arsenal - Tailor each weapon with devastating upgrades including scopes, grips, barrels and dozens of other unique attachments. Each weapon boasts its own powerful impact and visual flair
 * Unleash Death from Afar or Go Toe-to-Toe - Customize your soldier and squad to engage the enemy on your terms. A huge variety of weapons, abilities and equipment allow you to combat the enemy in your preferred style of play
 * Play with Kinect - Mass Effect 3 features compatibility with the Kinect Sensor for Xbox 360

ADDITIONAL SCREENSHOTS
feature_bullets: Battle as Commander Shepard on many worlds across the galaxy as you unite the ultimate force to take back the Earth before it's too late
Enormous enemies and take on a smarter type of foe that will consistently challenge your best combat tactics and put you on the edge of your seat
Customize your Commander Shepard, your squad and weapons to engage the enemy on your terms
Allows the option to import decisions from both of the previous games and supports optional use of the Kinect Sensor for Xbox 360
Experience a new emphasis on melee combat, movement and an improved cover system
